problem.markdown:
Which of the following algorithms are not correct? (x) An algorithm that counts time forever ( ) An algorithm that measures the length of a word ( ) An algorithm that turns on the lights in your room at 8pm ( ) None of the above
[explanation] An algorithm that counts time runs forever, just like a timer. So it is not a corret algorithm. It is equivalent a counter from 0 to infinity. However, the 3rd option is a correct algorithm, because it runs once every day at 8pm, not forever. [explanation]
